lines.text: x f = final position, x i = initial position, v i = initial velocity, a = acceleration, v f = final velocity, ∆ t = elapsed time

secText:
Lesson:
1. Introduce motion equations and define the variables in [OBJ:expsec_b776:motion equations].
2. [OBJ:actsec_c4512d:Determine the acceleration of a car using motion equations].
3. Work through a sample problem to [OBJ:app_sprinter_question:determine a runner’s final velocity].
